name: Dazzled
description:
Hi everyone !

This is my first game ever !

I hope you enjoy playing !

Complete short levels by collecting crystals, fighting enemies and navigating through dark mazes. Use precision and tactics to your advantage.Get upgrades and new weapons along the way to face the more difficult enemies with ease. Use precision and tactics to your advantage. Go for high score, minimal deaths or just have fun and mess around.

If you have any feedback please feel free to leave a comment, it will help a lot.
